page.title: 11Territorial Army in Sheldon
page.content: NAME:5th Battalion of the Royal Regiment of Fusiliers(Sheldon Branch). THE CENTRE:Formed 1968.Pay per day is 12 pounds.Annual bonus paid dependant upon amount of service and successful completion of set tests & a medical. They wear a red & white hackle which is part of the hat, lightweight trousers, battle dress, black boots and a combat jacket.The hackle came to be white and red because after the war the soldiers dipped the white feathers into the frenchmen's blood. The T.A. have to spend 1 day a week at the centre & go on the 2 week annual camp to Germany or in the U.K. If there was a war they would reinforce our troops in Germany. JOINING AND COMMITMENTS: To join the T.A. you have to be over 17 and can be male or female. Your uniform is free and you have to keep it clean. Good education is also needed.
